```{r}
#Library import
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# Load necessary libraries
library(ggplot2)

# Load the dataset
data <- read.csv("car_price.csv")

# Select numeric columns
numeric_cols <- data[sapply(data, is.numeric)]

# Create a boxplot for each numeric column
for (col_name in colnames(numeric_cols)) {
  # Create the boxplot using tidy evaluation
  plot <- ggplot(data, aes(x = "", y = .data[[col_name]])) +
    geom_boxplot(outlier.colour = "red", outlier.shape = 16, outlier.size = 2) +
    labs(title = paste("Boxplot of", col_name), y = col_name, x = "") +
    theme_minimal()
  
  # Print the plot to view
  print(plot)
}
```
